question: Successful management ensures that

options.label: Option 2
options.text: Management is a goal oriented process

question: Which of the following are Consumer Disputes Redressal Agencies?
explanation: There are quasi-judicial bodies established under the Act to provide simple, speedy and inexpensive redressal to the consumers’ grievances. These have been established at three levels: District, State and National known as • District Consumer Disputes Redressal Commission or District Commission • State Consumer Disputes Redressal Commission or State Commission • National Consumer Disputes Redressal Commission or National Commission.

question: The secondary market is a platform in which

question: An efficient market is defined as one in which

options.label: Option 1
options.text: All participants have the same opportunity to make the make the same returns

options.label: Option 2
options.text: All participants have the same legal rights and transactions costs

options.label: Option 3
options.text: Securities prices quickly and fully reflect all available information

options.label: Option 4
options.text: Securities prices are completely in line with the intrinsic value

explanation: Market efficiency refers to the degree to which market prices reflect all available, relevant information. If markets are efficient, then all information is already incorporated into prices, and so there is no way to 'beat' the market because there are no undervalued or overvalued securities available.

question: The inverse relationship between interest rates and bond prices is due to the following fact:

options.label: Option 1
options.text: Market makers require a bid-ask spread to offer their services at all

options.label: Option 2
options.text: That maturity premiums increase with the term of a bond.

options.label: Option 3
options.text: A bond price represents the present discounted value of the payments agreed upon at the time when the bond was issued.

options.label: Option 4
options.text: Capital markets are not efficient for long-maturity loans

explanation: The relationship between interest rates and bond prices: If interest rates rise, term deposits and newly issued bonds will pay investors higher rates than existing bonds. Therefore, the price of older bonds will generally fall to compensate and sell at a discount.

question: Working capital management is managing

question: Co-ordination is considered to be the essence of management because

options.label: Option 1
options.text: It is a common thread that runs through all the activities within the organisation

options.label: Option 2
options.text: It is implicit and inherent in all functions of the organisation

options.label: Option 3
options.text: It is a force that binds all the functions of management

explanation: Coordination is the capacity of the management that guarantees various groups and departments work in a state of harmony. In this manner, there is solidarity and unity of activity among the departments, employees, and groups. It additionally brings in harmony with completing the various errands and business activities to accomplish the association’s goals and objectives proficiently. The smooth operation of any business lies with coordination being an essential part of all activities and departments.

question: Identify the nature of management.
